meanings.definition: Insensitivity or indifference to the feelings of others.
meanings.sent1: Her callousnesses towards her friends hurt their feelings.
meanings.sent2: His callousnesses made it hard for him to empathize with others.
meanings.sent3: Despite his callousnesses, he still managed to make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The callousnesses in his heart turned him into a stone-cold individual.
meanings.sent5: The callousnesses in her demeanor made her seem unapproachable.

meanings.definition: The quality of being emotionally hardened or unfeeling.
meanings.sent1: The callousnesses in his behavior made it difficult for others to connect with him.
meanings.sent2: Her callousnesses were evident in the way she brushed off others' emotions.
meanings.sent3: Despite his callousnesses, he still showed kindness to animals.
meanings.sent4: The callousnesses in her eyes revealed a deep sense of detachment.
meanings.sent5: The callousnesses in his voice made it clear he had been through a lot.
